requirements_en.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7 or later
  • Processor: Dual-core processor, 2.0 GHz
  • Memory: 2 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Integrated graphics or better
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Storage: 100 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Integrated sound card
  • VR Support: Not applicable
  • Additional Notes: Runs on most basic systems, no special hardware required
requirements_en.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Dual-core processor, 1.5 GHz or better
  • Memory: 4 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Dedicated GPU
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 200 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Integrated or dedicated sound card
  • VR Support: Not applicable
  • Additional Notes: Optimized for smooth gameplay on mid-range hardware

requirements_en.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 (64 bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-4590 / AMD FX 8350
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX1060 (VRAM 6GB) / Radeon RX 580 (VRAM 4GB)
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
  • VR Support: - Supported Headsets: SteamVR-compatible headsets (Valve Index, HTC Vive, Meta Quest 2, 3, and 3S via Link) - Controllers: Requires VR controllers (Vive, Index, Quest controllers) - Additional Hardware: A physical bow is required, with the left VR controller attached to it for tracking. The left controller vibrates upon releasing the bowstring to register the shot.
  • Additional Notes: The framerate may drop during graphic-intensive scenes. - Additional storage is required for each subsequent update. - Additional Hardware: A physical bow (AccuBow VR hardware) is required to play this game, with the left VR controller attached to it for tracking. The left controller vibrates upon releasing the bowstring to register the shot. You can purchase this physical bow (AccuBow VR hardware) from AccuBow Store
requirements_en.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 (64 bit) / Windows 11 (64 bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core i7 8700 / AMD Ryzen 5 3600
  • Memory: 12 GB RAM
  • Graphics: RTX2070 / Radeon RX 5700XT
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
  • VR Support: - Supported Headsets: SteamVR-compatible headsets (Valve Index, HTC Vive, Meta Quest 2, 3, and 3S via Link) - Controllers: Requires VR controllers (Vive, Index, Quest controllers) - Additional Hardware: A physical bow is required, with the left VR controller attached to it for tracking. The left controller vibrates upon releasing the bowstring to register the shot.
  • Additional Notes: The framerate may drop during graphic-intensive scenes. - Additional storage is required for each subsequent update. - Additional Hardware: A physical bow (AccuBow VR hardware) is required to play this game, with the left VR controller attached to it for tracking. The left controller vibrates upon releasing the bowstring to register the shot. You can purchase this physical bow (AccuBow VR hardware) from AccuBow Store
